decision_reasoning: allegations of inadequate representation must notify former counsel but do not mention notifying regulatory bodies
standard_of_review: unreasonable as per case law and IRB rules
result_of_case: Judicial review allowed; case sent back to RPD for reassessment.
cause_of_action: Applicant's refugee claim was dismissed due to alleged abandonment and failure to file BOC. She claimed incompetence of her immigration consultant.
procedure_followed: Judicial review of the RPD decision. Analysis focused on whether notifying a regulatory body is mandatory for incompetence claims.
